title: Six Australians. Episodes 4-6
creator_credit: John McGowan and Australian Broadcasting Corporation
brief_description: Winner of the Human Rights Commission Inaugural Media Award 1984. The series explores the life and times of six Aboriginal Australians: Sylvia Blanco, Maurice Rioli, Neenya Charles (Eps 1-3), Trevor Adamson, Freda Glynn, Cliff Coulthard (Eps 4-6)
